title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K 9/30/33; lower right in graphite: SCA:E 1"=1'0"/7488 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of long, horizontal sideboard. Top in dark, reflective material (Bakelite?), wood body, legs and stretcher in darker wood. Four rectangular drawers (stacked in sets of 2) with two circular pulls on each drawer. Straight, squared, and tapered legs, with stretcher along back and sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-911.
